alert.note: Alert for Conway; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:24AM CDT until June 18 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL VAN BUREN...NORTHEASTERN CONWAY AND NORTHWESTERN FAULKNER COUNTIES... At 223 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Woolum to near Choctaw to Pickles Gap, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Conway... Clinton... Greenbrier... Wooster... Guy... Damascus... Twin Groves... Pickles Gap... Claude... Catholic Point... Mallet Town... Whipple... Springhill... Choctaw... Springfield... Bee Branch... Alread... Austin in Conway County... Rupert... Scotland... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
